name: Takeoff from East Midlands (Jet2 Boeing 757-200)
description:
Departure from East Midlands Airport runway 09 onboard Jet2 757 G-LSAJ "New York", operating flight LS631 to Arrecife, Lanzarote.  We taxi to the active runway before taking off on an easterly heading, climbing out over the M1 before turning right towards Leicester, where we reach at the end of the video.  Taken from seat 5A.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
